main.java.tsp

Interface TSP

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemplateTSP, TSP1

    public interface TSP
    The Interface for a TSP class that will be used to calculate the solution to the tsp we need to solve.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCostBestSolution()
      Gets the cost of the best solution.
      java.lang.Boolean getLimitTimeReached()
      Gets the limit time reached.
      void searchSolution(int limitTime, Repository repository, java.util.HashMap<Delivery,java.util.HashMap<Delivery,AtomicPath>> allPaths, boolean continueInterruptedCalculation)
      Search solution.

    • Method Detail

      • getLimitTimeReached

        java.lang.Boolean getLimitTimeReached()
        Gets the limit time reached.
        Returns:
        the limit time reached

      • searchSolution

        void searchSolution(int limitTime,
                    Repository repository,
                    java.util.HashMap<Delivery,java.util.HashMap<Delivery,AtomicPath>> allPaths,
                    boolean continueInterruptedCalculation)
             throws TSPLimitTimeReachedException
        Search solution.
        Parameters:
        limitTime - the limit time
        repository - the repository
        allPaths - all the paths between each delivery
        continueInterruptedCalculation - true if the method is called after having interrupted the calculation at least once
        Throws:
        TSPLimitTimeReachedException - when the limit time we set for the calculation is reached before the end of the calculation

        Gets the cost of the best solution.

        the cost of the best solution
